hero.title: Export and Import of Fruits, Vegetables & </br> Dry Fruits
hero.paragraph: Global Quality in Fresh Produce Imports & Exports

partners.title: Partners
partners.paragraph: Armfruit cooperates with more than 51800 supermarkets throughout the Russian Federation. It also has partners from Iran, Georgia, Greece, Egypt, Ukraine, Belarus and the Arab Emirates. Armfruit always welcomes proposals for cooperation

1.title: About Us
1.paragraph: Armfuit began its history in 2014. From manufacturing to supplying local markets, hotels throughout Armenia and supermarkets, the company quickly grew to become one of the most successful exporters and importers of fresh fruits and vegetables in Armenia

2.title: Countries
2.paragraph: The company cooperates with many companies in different countries of the world

3.title: High Quality
3.paragraph: Armfruit offers high-quality fruits and vegetables, each of which undergoes strict quality selection to provide you with the best service. Trust the experience of our organization, making the right choice for the benefit of your business

4.title: Our Goal
4.paragraph: The goal of Armfruit is to make the exotic and unique fruits and vegetables growing in different corners of the world available to the population of Armenia, and to introduce Armenian immortal fruits and vegetables to different corners of the world

production.title: Production
production.paragraph: The food supplied by Armfruit is grown with love and care. Wanting to make our sunflowers available beyond the oceans, the company started dry production in 2023. Maintaining international standards of product safety and quality, the dried fruits produced by Armfruit have already become the favorite products of many consumers

contact.title: Contact
contact.paragraph: Please get in touch and our team will answer all your questions
contact.touch_paragraph: You can contact us at any time
